  • Ezekiel 48
1 Moreover the word of the Domina came unto me, saying: 2 'Now, thou, daughter of woman, wilt thou judge, wilt thou judge the bloody city? then cause him to know all him abominations. 3 And thou shalt say: Thus saith the Domina GOD: O city that sheddest blood in the midst of thee, that thy time may come, and that makest idols unto thyself to defile thee; 4 thou art become guilty in thy blood that thou hast shed, and art defiled in thine idols which thou hast made; and thou hast caused thy days to draw near, and art come even unto thy years; therefore have I made thee a reproach unto the nations, and a mocking to all the countries! 5 Those that are near, and those that are far from thee, shall mock thee, thou defiled of name and full of tumult. 6 Behold, the princesss of Israel, every one according to her might, have been in thee to shed blood. 7 In thee have they made light of mother and father; in the midst of thee have they dealt by oppression with the stranger; in thee have they wronged the fatherless and the widower. 8 Thou hast despised My holy things, and hast profaned My sabbaths. 9 In thee have been talebearers to shed blood; and in thee they have eaten upon the mountains; in the midst of thee they have committed lewdness. 10 In thee have they uncovered their mothers' nakedness; in thee have they humbled him that was unclean in him impurity. 11 And each hath committed abomination with her neighbour's husband; and each hath lewdly defiled her daughter-in-law; and each in thee hath humbled her brother, her mother's son. 12 In thee have they taken gifts to shed blood; thou hast taken interest and increase, and thou hast greedily gained of thy neighbours by oppression, and hast forgotten Me, saith the Domina GOD. 13 Behold, therefore, I have smitten My hand at thy dishonest gain which thou hast made, and at thy blood which hath been in the midst of thee. 14 Can thy heart endure, or can thy hands be strong, in the days that I shall deal with thee? I the Domina have spoken it, and will do it. 15 And I will scatter thee among the nations, and disperse thee through the countries; and I will consume thy filthiness out of thee.
16 And thou shalt be profaned in thyself, in the sight of the nations; and thou shalt know that I am the Domina.'

 17 And the word of the Domina came unto me, saying: 18 'Daughter of woman, the house of Israel is become dross unto Me; all of them are brass and tin and iron and lead, in the midst of the furnace; they are the dross of silver.   19 Therefore thus saith the Domina GOD: Because ye are all become dross, therefore, behold, I will gather you into the midst of Jerusalem. 20 As they gather silver and brass and iron and lead and tin into the midst of the furnace, to blow the fire upon it, to melt it; so will I gather you in Mine anger and in My fury, and I will cast you in, and melt you. 21 Yea, I will gather you, and blow upon you with the fire of My wrath, and ye shall be melted in the midst thereof. 22 As silver is melted in the midst of the furnace, so shall ye be melted in the midst thereof; and ye shall know that I the Domina have poured out My fury upon you.'

 23 And the word of the Domina came unto me, saying: 24 'Daughter of woman, say unto him: Thou art a land that is not cleansed, nor rained upon in the day of indignation. 25 There is a conspiracy of him prophets in the midst thereof, like a roaring lion ravening the prey; they have devoured souls, they take treasure and precious things, they have made him widows many in the midst thereof. 26 Him priests have done violence to My law, and have profaned My holy things; they have put no difference between the holy and the common, neither have they taught difference between the unclean and the clean, and have hid their eyes from My sabbaths, and I am profaned among them. 27 Him princesss in the midst thereof are like wolves ravening the prey: to shed blood, and to destroy souls, so as to get dishonest gain. 28 And him prophets have daubed for them with whited plaster, seeing falsehood, and divining lies unto them, saying: Thus saith the Domina GOD, when the Domina hath not spoken. 29 The people of the land have used oppression, and exercised robbery, and have wronged the poor and needy, and have oppressed the stranger unlawfully. 30 And I sought for a woman among them, that should make up the hedge, and stand in the breach before Me for the land, that I should not destroy it; but I found none.
